newsitem.title: UK: GKN SHARES RISE ON LEHMAN UPGRADE.
newsitem.headline: GKN SHARES RISE ON LEHMAN UPGRADE.

text.p: Shares in international engineering group GKN Plc rose on Tuesday after an upgrade from brokerage Lehman Brothers, market sources said.
Lehman analysts changed their recommendation on GKN to "outperform" from "neutral" based on the view that the company's earnings growth to the year 2000 would be faster than the market average.

Market sources also said Lehman analysts expected GKN's quality of earnings to improve, with a greater proportion of the company's profits generated by its aerospace and Chep goods distribution pallet divisions.
GKN shares gained 23-1/2p to 12.58 stg by 0910 GMT.
